## sum() function

Calculate the sum of two numbers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sum(a: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | number | first number |
|  b | number | second number |

<b>Returns:</b>
